name: Roasted by my own sons - 50th birthday speech
description:
Here's something a little different - me on the receiving end.  My sons took to the stage at my 50th birthday party to tell a few tales. 

I thought we had actually lost this footage forever due to a computer crash.  Very happy that we have just found it again so am posting it up here so it will be saved forever.  

When I was their age I was so shy I couldn't talk in front of 4 people let alone almost 200. I am in absolute awe at their ability to hold a room and bounce off each other they way they did.  Very proud dad!!

The party was back in 2019. A great night with friends celebrating in a covid free world.  The party was held in the ballroom at work and was 1920's themed.  As they say, a good night was had by all.  

#best50thbirthdayspeech #birthdayspeech
